verses.verse: And God <S%H430><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> Arise, <S%H6965><s%> go <S%H5927><s%> up to Bethel, <S%H1008><s%> and dwell <S%H3427><s%> there: <S%H8033><s%> and make <S%H6213><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> an altar <S%H4196><s%> to God, <S%H410><s%> that appeared <S%H7200><s%> to you when you fled <S%H1272><s%> from the face <S%H6440><s%> of Esau <S%H6215><s%> your brother. <S%H251><s%>

Then Jacob <S%H3290><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to his household, <S%H1004><s%> and to all <S%H3605><s%> that were with him, Put <S%H5493><s%> away the strange <S%H5236><s%> gods <S%H430><s%> that are among <S%H8432><s%> you, and be clean, <S%H2891><s%> and change <S%H2498><s%> your garments: <S%H8071><s%>

And let us arise, <S%H6965><s%> and go <S%H5927><s%> up to Bethel; <S%H1008><s%> and I will make <S%H6213><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> an altar <S%H4196><s%> to God, <S%H410><s%> who answered <S%H6030><s%> me in the day <S%H3117><s%> of my distress, <S%H6869><s%> and was with me in the way <S%H1870><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I went. <S%H1980><s%>

And they gave <S%H5414><s%> to Jacob <S%H3290><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the strange <S%H5236><s%> gods <S%H430><s%> which <S%H834><s%> were in their hand, <S%H3027><s%> and all their earrings <S%H5141><s%> which <S%H834><s%> were in their ears; <S%H241><s%> and Jacob <S%H3290><s%> hid <S%H2934><s%> them under <S%H8478><s%> the oak <S%H424><s%> which <S%H834><s%> was by Shechem. <S%H7927><s%>

And they journeyed: <S%H5265><s%> and the terror <S%H2847><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> was on the cities <S%H5892><s%> that were round <S%H5439><s%> about them, and they did not pursue <S%H7291><s%> after <S%H310><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jacob. <S%H3290><s%>

So Jacob <S%H3290><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to Luz, <S%H3870><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan, <S%H3667><s%> that is, Bethel, <S%H1008><s%> he and all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> that were with him.

And he built <S%H1129><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> an altar, <S%H4196><s%> and called <S%H7121><s%> the place <S%H4725><s%> Elbethel: <S%H416><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> God <S%H430><s%> appeared <S%H1540><s%> to him, when he fled <S%H1272><s%> from the face <S%H6440><s%> of his brother. <S%H251><s%>

But Deborah <S%H1683><s%> Rebekah's <S%H7259><s%> nurse <S%H3243><s%> died, <S%H4191><s%> and she was buried <S%H6912><s%> beneath <S%H8478><s%> Bethel <S%H1008><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> an oak: <S%H437><s%> and the name <S%H8034><s%> of it was called <S%H7121><s%> Allonbachuth. <S%H439><s%>
And God <S%H430><s%> appeared <S%H7200><s%> to Jacob <S%H3290><s%> again, <S%H5750><s%> when he came <S%H935><s%> out of Padanaram, <S%H6307><s%> and blessed <S%H1288><s%> him.

And God <S%H430><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, Your name <S%H8034><s%> is Jacob: <S%H3290><s%> your name <S%H8034><s%> shall not be called <S%H7121><s%> any <S%H5750><s%> more <S%H5750><s%> Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> but Israel <S%H3478><s%> shall be your name: <S%H8034><s%> and he called <S%H7121><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And God <S%H430><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, I am God <S%H410><s%> Almighty: <S%H7706><s%> be fruitful <S%H6509><s%> and multiply; <S%H7235><s%> a nation <S%H1471><s%> and a company <S%H6951><s%> of nations <S%H1471><s%> shall be of you, and kings <S%H4428><s%> shall come <S%H3318><s%> out of your loins; <S%H2504><s%>

And the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I gave <S%H5414><s%> Abraham <S%H85><s%> and Isaac, <S%H3327><s%> to you I will give <S%H5414><s%> it, and to your seed <S%H2233><s%> after <S%H310><s%> you will I give <S%H5414><s%> the land. <S%H776><s%>
And God <S%H430><s%> went <S%H5927><s%> up from him in the place <S%H4725><s%> where <S%H834><s%> he talked <S%H1696><s%> with him.

And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> set <S%H5324><s%> up a pillar <S%H4676><s%> in the place <S%H4725><s%> where he talked <S%H1696><s%> with him, even a pillar <S%H4678><s%> of stone: <S%H68><s%> and he poured <S%H5258><s%> a drink <S%H5262><s%> offering thereon, <S%H5921><s%> and he poured <S%H3332><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%> thereon. <S%H5921><s%>
And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of the place <S%H4725><s%> where <S%H834><s%> God <S%H430><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> with him, Bethel. <S%H1008><s%>

And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from Bethel; <S%H1008><s%> and there was but a little <S%H3530><s%> way <S%H776><s%> to come <S%H935><s%> to Ephrath: <S%H672><s%> and Rachel <S%H7354><s%> travailed, <S%H3205><s%> and she had hard <S%H7185><s%> labor. <S%H3205><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass, when she was in hard <S%H7185><s%> labor, <S%H3205><s%> that the midwife <S%H3205><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to her, Fear <S%H3372><s%> not; you shall have this <S%H2088><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> also. <S%H1571><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass, as her soul <S%H5315><s%> was in departing, <S%H3318><s%> (for she died) <S%H4191><s%> that she called <S%H7121><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> Benoni: <S%H1126><s%> but his father <S%H1><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> him Benjamin. <S%H1144><s%>
And Rachel <S%H7354><s%> died, <S%H4191><s%> and was buried <S%H6912><s%> in the way <S%H1870><s%> to Ephrath, <S%H672><s%> which <S%H1931><s%> is Bethlehem. <S%H1035><s%>
And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> set <S%H5324><s%> a pillar <S%H4676><s%> on her grave: <S%H6900><s%> that is the pillar <S%H4678><s%> of Rachel's <S%H7354><s%> grave <S%H6900><s%> to this day. <S%H3117><s%>
And Israel <S%H3478><s%> journeyed, <S%H5265><s%> and spread <S%H5186><s%> his tent <S%H168><s%> beyond <S%H1973><s%> the tower <S%H4026><s%> of Edar. <S%H5740><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass, when Israel <S%H3478><s%> dwelled <S%H7931><s%> in that land, <S%H776><s%> that Reuben <S%H7205><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> and lay <S%H7901><s%> with Bilhah <S%H1090><s%> his father's <S%H1><s%> concubine: <S%H6370><s%> and Israel <S%H3478><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> it. Now the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%> were twelve: <S%H8147><s%>

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Leah; <S%H3812><s%> Reuben, <S%H7205><s%> Jacob's <S%H3290><s%> firstborn, <S%H1060><s%> and Simeon, <S%H8095><s%> and Levi, <S%H3878><s%> and Judah, <S%H3063><s%> and Issachar, <S%H3485><s%> and Zebulun: <S%H2074><s%>
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Rachel; <S%H7354><s%> Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> and Benjamin: <S%H1144><s%>
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Bilhah, <S%H1090><s%> Rachel's <S%H7354><s%> handmaid; <S%H8198><s%> Dan, <S%H1835><s%> and Naphtali: <S%H5321><s%>

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Zilpah, <S%H2153><s%> Leah's <S%H3812><s%> handmaid: <S%H8198><s%> Gad, <S%H1410><s%> and Asher: <S%H836><s%> these <S%H428><s%> are the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> which <S%H834><s%> were born <S%H3205><s%> to him in Padanaram. <S%H6307><s%>

And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to Isaac <S%H3327><s%> his father <S%H1><s%> to Mamre, <S%H4471><s%> to the city <S%H7151><s%> of Arbah, <S%H704><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is Hebron, <S%H2275><s%> where <S%H834><s%> Abraham <S%H85><s%> and Isaac <S%H3327><s%> sojourned. <S%H1481><s%>
And the days <S%H3117><s%> of Isaac <S%H3327><s%> were an hundred <S%H3967><s%> and fourscore <S%H8084><s%> years. <S%H8141><s%>

And Isaac <S%H3327><s%> gave up the ghost, <S%H1478><s%> and died, <S%H4191><s%> and was gathered <S%H622><s%> to his people, <S%H5971><s%> being old <S%H2205><s%> and full <S%H7649><s%> of days: <S%H3117><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> Esau <S%H6215><s%> and Jacob <S%H3290><s%> buried <S%H6912><s%> him.
